item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:416 Chances: CNH Industrial N.V. has successfully concluded the â‚¬400 million component of its $1 billion share buyback program, indicating a positive outlook for the company’s financial performance. The company’s partnership with the Catholic University of Cordoba (UCC) to educate Argentina’s next generation of farmers demonstrates a commitment to innovation and future growth.
